      • getTargetActivity

        @NonNull
public java.lang.Class getTargetActivity()
        Description copied from class: UISettings
        Returns target activity. Concrete settings can be used only with the corresponding activity. This method is public for convenience when you are not able to use ActivityRunner. DO NOT USE THIS METHOD UNLESS YOU KNOW WHAT YOU ARE DOING. Improper usage will crash your app.
        Specified by:
        getTargetActivity in class UISettings
        Returns:
        target activity.

      • setFirstSideInstructions

        public void setFirstSideInstructions(@Nullable
                                     java.lang.String firstSideInstructions)
        Description copied from interface: ScanInstructionsUIOptions
        Sets user instructions that are shown above camera preview while the first side of the document is being scanned. Please prefer to use ScanInstructionsUIOptions.setFirstSideInstructionsResourceID(int). If both methods were called, instructions that were set as string resource will be taken.
        Specified by:
        setFirstSideInstructions in interface ScanInstructionsUIOptions
        Parameters:
